attributes.action: lift the permeant speed limit on the m4 between junction 24 to 28
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel it is more dangerous with the speed limit set to 50 mph on the m4 between junction 24 (coldra) to 28 (tredegar) as some cars still do 70 mph and some do 50 mph it only takes one fool to take his eyes off the road for a second to have a bad crash and the last three times the m4 was closed due to a crash speed was not the factor in the crash
